content:
I've started seeing this is the last few weeks: image.png
What's causing that? Is it a PHP thing, or Devel, or something else? Documentation?

It's an object oriented programming concept: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Object-oriented_programming#Encapsulation
What you see there maps to the object definition here: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/blob/4e60b7d3c71a6187dfcaeb159af0ee64e56b7753/core/includes/config.inc#L372

backdrop/backdrop
Backdrop core code repository. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop development by creating an account on GitHub.
I'm assuming you meant why the object properties are now appearing in Krumo output? Because I havent seen that happen before, I dont think.
Yes sorry. I have a basic understanding of OOP, so I know its related to that, but never seen it in Krumo output before...
I've seen it for quite some time.
Or maybe I've never dpm'd anything with a protected property before?
